results.description: Huesca's spell in La Liga lasts one year as they are relegated with a home thrashing by top-four chasing Valencia.
results.title: Huesca relegated by 6-2 Valencia thrashing

results.description: An under-strength Barcelona draw 0-0 at La Liga's bottom club Huesca.

results.title: Huesca 0-0 Barcelona: Weakened leaders draw in La Liga

results.description: League leaders Barcelona travel to Huesca in La Liga but rest players with Manchester United in mind - follow live text commentary.
results.title: Weakened Barcelona draw at Huesca

results.description: Karim Benzema scores a dramatic late winner as Real Madrid come from behind to beat bottom side Huesca 3-2 in a La Liga thriller.
results.shortTitle: Benzema strikes to earn win for Real
results.title: Real Madrid 3-2 Huesca: Karim Benzema scored last-minute winner for hosts

results.description: Follow live text commentary, bet images and social media as Real Madrid host Huesca and Inter Milan face Lazio.

results.title: Real Madrid v Huesca, Inter Milan v Lazio

results.description: Gareth Bale scores the winner as Real Madrid move back into La Liga's top four with a hard-fought victory at bottom side Huesca.

results.title: Real Madrid beat Huesca 1-0: Gareth Bale scores only goal of game

results.description: Atletico Madrid beat minnows Huesca 3-0 in La Liga thanks to three first-half goals.
results.title: Atletico Madrid brush past struggling Huesca with 3-0 win

results.description: Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez both score twice as Barcelona hit eight goals past La Liga newcomers Huesca.
